body:
When I say Sword Art Online IRL is Here, I mean that the concept of virtual reality has finally come into the lives of humans. For those of you who have watched SAO or SAO II, you know that the whole anime is based off of virtual reality. Maybe you have seen Summer Wars and realized that everything in their world is controlled by a virtual CPU.

And now, I introduce to you (this was not made by me), a new way to look at games, movies, etc!

Read this to read more about this.
Watch this for more information.

Want to know something else that's cool?
Google has developed their own cheap way to virtual reality. They have just used a phone and some cardboard to manage it.
Read it Here

Thanks for reading!

-DarkAssassin_ (aka FrankenRavi)
